```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse) 
library(primer.data)
```


```{r}
set.seed(10)

x <- nhanes |>
  filter(age >= 18 & age <= 27) |>
  select(height, sex) |>
  drop_na() |>
  slice_sample(n = 50) 
```

## Summary
Height is a fundamental physical trait and often varies by sex, age, and other biological characteristics. Using data from the National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey (NHANES), which includes thousands of observations collected across the United States, we investigate the average difference in height between male and female individuals.
